com.yantra.yfc.rcp

Interface IYRCTraceMessageFilter


  • public interface IYRCTraceMessageFilter
    Interface used to provide a callback hook to applications during tracing of log statements. Implementations of this interface can use this hook to hide/filter sensitive information like credit card/passwords/CVV numbers from the logs.
    Author:
    statikonda
    See Also:
    YRCPlatformUI.addTraceMessageFilter(IYRCTraceMessageFilter)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.StringBuffer filterMessage(java.lang.StringBuffer message)
      This method will be called to filter the sensitive data from the message being logged.

    • Method Detail

      • filterMessage

        java.lang.StringBuffer filterMessage(java.lang.StringBuffer message)
        This method will be called to filter the sensitive data from the message being logged.
        Parameters:
        message - The message which will be traced to the log file.
        Returns:
        A filtered message after removing the sensitive information.
        NOTE: The return value will be the final trace message, returning null will skip the trace statement altogether, and any subsequent filters will be skipped.
        See Also:
        YRCPlatformUI.addTraceMessageFilter(IYRCTraceMessageFilter)
